summary: An out-of-state company disagrees with the Tax Ruling it received from the Department, informing Taxpayer that it provides a dating service, which is a retail business activity subject to Washington’s Retailing B&O tax under RCW 82.04.050(3), and that it must charge retail sales tax on the charges its Washington customers pay for that service under RCW 82.08.020. We affirm the Tax Ruling.
